definition: (of taste) hot or pungent/hard/laborious/suffering/eighth in order/eighth of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/letter "H" or Roman "VIII" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/ancient Chinese compass point: 285°/octa
to toil/labor/laborer/to put sb to trouble (of doing sth)/meritorious deed/to console (Taiwan pr. [lao4] for this sense)

sentences.english: You're not going to want us on the highways.
sentences.chinese: 你不會希望我們的還在高速公路上辛勞吧。

sentences.english: Thank you for the great trouble you have taken to help me with my English.
sentences.chinese: 謝謝你不辭辛勞的幫助我學習英語。

sentences.english: It’s whether the hard work and industry of our people is rewarded.
sentences.chinese: 這事關我們人民的辛勞工作和行業是否能得到回報。

sentences.english: Real happiness lies in the fruit of labor produced by one's sweat and toil. (prov.
sentences.chinese: 真正的幸福是用汗水和辛勞創造出的勞動成果。

sentences.english: Toil and sweat done, an apprentice meditates before a Shinto shrine.
sentences.chinese: 一個新手在付出辛勞和汗水後蹲坐在神社前。

sentences.english: After much toil and trouble though I finally nailed down a preliminary design.
sentences.chinese: 經過多番的辛勞和麻煩，雖然我最後釘下了初步設計。

sentences.english: She a excessive toil, asthma will attack, to get BaoMu hate and scold.
sentences.chinese: 她一辛勞過度，哮喘病就發作，惹來鴇母討厭及責罵。

sentences.english: The nickname is from the MormonChurchChurch's symbol for hard work.
sentences.chinese: 這一別名來摩門教會對於辛勞工作的象徵。

sentences.english: After hard work, the wood to the doctor arrived in nine marder church place a doctor.
sentences.chinese: 幾經辛勞，柴九才抵達白朗大夫的教堂處求醫。

sentences.english: Our toil, resources, and livelihood are all involved.
sentences.chinese: 我們的辛勞，資源和生計全部生計都命懸於此。

sentences.english: Back to school after must endure brawn limit of toil stop makes up a missed lesson.
sentences.chinese: 回到學校後又得忍耐膂力極限的辛勞停止補課。

sentences.english: With 33 year pain, delays the compassion, abides by the pledge.
sentences.chinese: 用33年辛勞，延展愛心，信守承諾。

sentences.english: Mr Smith toiled for this children's behoof.
sentences.chinese: 史密斯先生爲他的兒女辛勞。

sentences.english: The editor has been slaving at his desk for hours .
sentences.chinese: 編輯已伏案辛勞了好幾個小時了。

sentences.english: After a day of hard work, we look forward to good relaxation.
sentences.chinese: 辛辛勞苦工作一天之後，大師都想好好放鬆一下。

sentences.english: You spare no pains of pay to make this cooperation obtain tremendous success.
sentences.chinese: 你們不辭辛勞的付出才使得本次合作取得巨大成功。

definition: care/solicitude/to show care for/concerned about/attentive to
making an all-out effort (idiom); to try one's heart out/to do one's utmost
to toil/labor/laborer/to put sb to trouble (of doing sth)/meritorious deed/to console (Taiwan pr. [lao4] for this sense)
for this reason/with regards to this/in this respect/in order to do this/to this end
to show appreciation (by kind words, small gifts etc)/to comfort
to offer respectfully/to consecrate/to dedicate/to devote
to be on duty (of a security guard etc)
